text:
OBVIOUS Q: If #Chloroquine showed promise in treating #coronavirus—why hasn’t this “anecdotal evidence” been presented by real doctors on @CNN, @MSNBC, in @nytimes, @washingtonpost & in medical journalism like @statnews, @NEJM, @TheLancet describing HOW & WHAT it’s helped?
